title: WTB 1908 Cy Young postcard by A.C. Williams
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: WTB 1908 Cy Young postcard by A.C. Williams
posts.post_content:
I am looking to acquire a 1908 Cy Young postcard by A.C. Williams.

Here is what it looks like.  If you have a copy you'd be willing to trade or sell please let me know.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=401618&d=1590364392[/IMG]

Anyone here win this REA lot in the Fall 2019 auction?

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=401859&d=1590446316[/IMG]
